Imagine yourself on a rocky beach, feeling the rough texture of the rocks beneath your feet. You are surrounded by a rugged landscape, with towering cliffs and towering waves crashing against them. You feel the spray of the ocean as you stand close to the edge, feeling the raw power of nature.

Imagine yourself on a sandy beach, feeling the soft sand beneath your feet. You are surrounded by a tropical island, with lush green palm trees and exotic plants. You feel the warm sun on your skin and the cool ocean breeze in your hair as you relax on the beach.
